properties.Name: Mrs. O'Reilly's House
properties.description: The famous house where Pat Mustard made his milk deliveries. A key location in the Speed 3 episode.

properties.Name: Vaughan's Pub
properties.description: The pub where Father Ted met with Craggy Island's Chinese community. A must-visit location for fans!

properties.Name: Kilfenora Community Hall
properties.description: Featured in 'Think Fast, Father Ted' where the infamous raffle took place.

properties.Name: St Fachanan's Church
properties.description: The church featured in the 'Going to America' episode. A beautiful historic building.

properties.Name: Linnanes Pub
properties.description: Where Dougal waited during the Speed 3 episode. Still serving great pints today!
